thread.title: "Romelu Lukaku will leave Everton for £60-70million" - says Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer
thread.title_full: "Romelu Lukaku will leave Everton for £60-70million" - says Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer

author: Thomas Bristow
title: "Romelu Lukaku will leave Everton for £60-70million" - says Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
Speaking on Match of the Day , Alan Shearer believes Romelu Lukaku will leave Everton this summer and has valued the striker at £60-70million. 
The Toffees striker scored his 20th and 21st Premier League goals on Saturday in his side's 4-0 win over Hull City. 
At just 23 years of age, the big Belgian continues to assert himself as one of the hottest prospects in Europe. 
And Lukaku put all major European clubs on red alert last week after refusing to sign a contract extension with Ronald Koeman's side. Shearer values Lukaku between £60-70m (Photo: @BBCMOTD/Twitter) 
With just two years left on the striker's current deal, Shearer believes the league's top goalscorer will leave this summer. 
"This is his fifth full season," said Shearer. "He's on target to play over 30 games in every one of those seasons which is just superb. Romelu Lukaku has been on fire this season (Photo: Getty) 
"I do think he'll go. I think the big boys will come sniffing for him. I think Man United will be looking for a forward or two, I think Arsenal will be looking for forward, even Chelsea. Romelu Lukaku signals to the crowd after scoring (Photo: REUTERS) 
"He's 23 years of age and got a fantastic scoring record. They [Everton] paid £28million for him three seasons ago, when you're looking at prices now, you got to be looking at £60-70million." 
"Is that all?" jokes Gary. poll loading Will Romelu Lukaku leave Everton this summer? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
